page.title: 09LEISURE
page.content: Thorpe is basically a small tranquil village with few amenities.Thorpe contains a bowling green and a {recreation ground}both built in 1966. There is a bowling team made up of local villagers.It is also used by casual players.The recreation ground contains see-saws,a slide and other playground features.The ground was built for the younger population of Thorpe.The ground also contains a tennis court.Football used to be a popular activity. In the surrounding area there are {two public houses}the Halfway House and the Fosse Way.The former is between Morton and Haddington.There is not a public house in Thorpe although there used to be.
